name: Flatiron School
summary: During my time at Flatiron School, I underwent an immersive and enriching educational experience that provided me with a solid foundation in software engineering. Through a comprehensive curriculum and hands-on projects, I acquired a deep understanding of industry-standard technologies and best practices. Collaborating closely with peers in team projects, I developed strong teamwork and communication skills, effectively contributing to the success of our collective endeavors. The rigorous and supportive environment at Flatiron School fostered my growth as a professional, equipping me with the necessary skills and mindset to excel in the field of software engineering.

name: University of California: Riverside
summary: By combining my studies at UCR with the intensive program at IEP (Institut d'Etudes Politiques (IEP) in Lyon, France), I honed my language proficiency, developed intercultural competence, and cultivated a passion for the intricate interplay between language, culture, and politics. These experiences have enriched my abilities to communicate effectively, analyze diverse perspectives, and navigate complex cross-cultural contexts.
